Description: Cuisinart Cuisinart Advantage professional-quality stainless steel knives have a cutting-edge, nonstick coating that makes slicing easier - and allows coding during food prep to avoid cross-contamination. In style-conscious hues for today's design-smart consumer, these premium knives come with matching blade guards and ergonomic handles.
Name: Cuisinart 12-Piece Printed Color Knife Set with Blade Guards
